verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his father's <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H7495>physicians<s%> to <S%H2590>embalm<s%> his father. So the <S%H1>physicians<s%> <S%H7495>embalmed<s%> <S%H2590>Israel.<s%>

Now <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>required<s%> for it, for <S%H3651>such<s%> is the <S%H3117>period<s%> <S%H4390>required<s%> for <S%H9151>embalming.<s%> And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> for him <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1068>mourning<s%> for him were <S%H5674>past,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1004>household<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

'My father made me <S%H1>swear,<s%> <S%H7650>saying,<s%> <S%H559>"Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H2009>die;<s%> in my <S%H4191>grave<s%> <S%H6913>which<s%> I <S%H834>dug<s%> for myself in the <S%H3738>land<s%> of <S%H776>Canaan,<s%> <S%H3667>there<s%> you shall <S%H8033>bury<s%> me." <S%H6912>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H6258>please<s%> let me <S%H4994>go<s%> up and <S%H5927>bury<s%> my father; then I will <S%H6912>return.<s%>' "
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5927>"Go<s%> up and <S%H6912>bury<s%> your father, as he made you <S%H1>swear.<s%>"

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H6912>bury<s%> his father, and with him <S%H1>went<s%> up <S%H5927>all<s%> the <S%H3605>servants<s%> of <S%H5650>Pharaoh,<s%> the <S%H6547>elders<s%> of his <S%H2205>household<s%> and <S%H1004>all<s%> the <S%H3605>elders<s%> of the <S%H2205>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>household<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and his father's <S%H1004>household;<s%> they <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> their <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> and their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>
There also <S%H5927>went<s%> up with him <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen;<s%> and it was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H4264>company.<s%>

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> they <S%H5594>lamented<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3515>sorrowful<s%> <S%H4553>lamentation;<s%> and he <S%H6213>observed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> for his father.

Now when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H60>mourning<s%> at the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is a <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> for the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>" <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it was <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> Abel-mizraim, <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
And <S%H3651>thus<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for him as he had <S%H6680>charged<s%> them;

for his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> him to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> had <S%H7069>bought<s%> along with the <S%H7704>field<s%> for a <S%H6913>burial<s%> <S%H272>site<s%> from <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> his father, <S%H1>Joseph<s%> <S%H3130>returned<s%> to <S%H7725>Egypt,<s%> he and his <S%H4714>brothers,<s%> and <S%H251>all<s%> who had <S%H3605>gone<s%> up with him to <S%H5927>bury<s%> his father.

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their father was <S%H1>dead,<s%> they <S%H4191>said,<s%> "What if Joseph should <S%H559>bear<s%> a <S%H7852>grudge<s%> <S%H7852>against<s%> us and <S%H7852>pay<s%> us <S%H7725>back<s%> in <S%H7725>full<s%> for <S%H7725>all<s%> the <S%H3605>wrong<s%> <S%H9567>which<s%> we <S%H834>did<s%> to him!"
So they <S%H6680>sent<s%> [a message] to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Your father <S%H1>charged<s%> <S%H6680>before<s%> he <S%H6440>died,<s%> <S%H4194>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5375>forgive,<s%> I <S%H577>beg<s%> you, the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> and their <S%H9128>sin,<s%> for they <S%H1580>did<s%> you <S%H9567>wrong.<s%>"' And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H5375>forgive<s%> the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of your father. "And <S%H1>Joseph<s%> <S%H3130>wept<s%> when they <S%H1058>spoke<s%> to him.

Then his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> we are your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>"
But <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Do not be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> for am I in God's <S%H8478>place<s%>?

"And as for you, you <S%H2803>meant<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, [but] <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2803>meant<s%> it for <S%H9186>good<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H6213>bring<s%> <S%H6213>about<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>present<s%> result, to <S%H2421>preserve<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2421>alive.<s%>

<S%H6258>"So<s%> therefore, do not be <S%H3372>afraid;<s%> I will <S%H3557>provide<s%> for you and your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones.<s%>" So he <S%H5162>comforted<s%> them and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3820>kindly<s%> to them.

Now <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> he and his father's <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H8029>third<s%> generation of Ephraim's <S%H1121>sons;<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> on Joseph's <S%H1290>knees.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "I am about to <S%H4191>die,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>take<s%> <S%H6485>care<s%> of you, and <S%H5927>bring<s%> you up from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H7650>promised<s%> on <S%H7650>oath<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>"

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>take<s%> <S%H6485>care<s%> of you, and you shall <S%H5927>carry<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> up from <S%H2088>here.<s%>"

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> at the <S%H1121>age<s%> of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and he was <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> and <S%H7760>placed<s%> in a <S%H727>coffin<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
